name: Masters Marketing Association
description:
Purpose: To provide social and academic support as well as forum for marketing and advertising related discussions and experiences.

Goals:
1) To support students and the community through service projects and social events.
2) To better member relations for the purpose of building a personal network.
3) Strengthen relationships between faculty and MMA members by sponsoring social events catered towards the faculty.
4) To gain marketing experience through assisting other student organizations as well as the community in marketing and advertising related projects.
